creditline: Gift of Roxy Ballard in loving memory of Richard Campbell
description: small image of Mars at enter holding a club aloft to strike a kneeling figure at his feet, inside an octagonal cartouche, surrounded by swords, arrows, wreaths and garlands, pair young caryatid-like figures wearing large helmets and carrying shields and arrows, pair of winged lions with men's heads, pairs of armored gloves and ribbons
marks:
Title and Inscription

LRC, printed in black: [6 bottom center, printed in black: [MARS OU LA GUERE
title: Mars ou La Guerre (Mars or War), plate 6 from "Arabesques, Inventes et graves"
